name: vite-plugin-inject-css-to-js
description: Combine this with the Vite build.cssCodeSplit CSS code splitting capability to build css into individual js files instead of using css links.

scripts.release-major: standard-version -t vite-plugin-inject-css-to-js@ --release-as major && git push --follow-tags origin main && pnpm build && npm publish
scripts.release-minor: standard-version -t vite-plugin-inject-css-to-js@ --release-as minor && git push --follow-tags origin main && pnpm build && npm publish
scripts.release-patch: standard-version -t vite-plugin-inject-css-to-js@ --release-as patch && git push --follow-tags origin main && pnpm build && npm publish

author: Levix
